impressum.title: Imprint
impressum.intro: Information according to § 5 TMG (duty to provide information for commercial providers). Please add the legally required details about your company (company name, address, representatives, contact, register court if applicable, VAT ID, etc.).

testimonials.quote: Great kebab! The cocktail sauce tastes fantastic, good bread, friendly staff – what more could you want! Great value for money.
testimonials.author: Alexandra Rinner

testimonials.quote: Really good food and super friendly service! Tasty vegan options!
testimonials.author: Lena Brandl

testimonials.quote: Great choice for döner, and the pizza is delicious too. Friendly, competent staff. Good prices.
testimonials.author: Christian Schaefer
